title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: Online Computer Programming Bridge Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic programming concepts and experience in writing simple code
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: By completing ten micro-modules designed according to the ADDG9E model, learners can implement Python-based problem-solving algorithms with 80% accuracy.
Through weekly project assignments, learners can enhance their code refactoring capabilities—reflecting real-world work scenarios—by at least three levels based on evaluation rubrics.
Using peer assessment and feedback systems, learners can participate in at least five collaborative coding projects and execute over 90% of code quality improvement suggestions.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
